message: I'm being fair here, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You were being too generous, now it's my turn to be fair
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split this fairly.
You're not being very generous, I'm starting to get a bit greedy
I'm getting tired of this, Bob. Let's settle this now.
You're getting desperate, I can sense it. I'm not giving in yet
I'm getting close to giving up, Bob. This is my final offer.
You're not even close to being fair, I'm going to take what I can get
This is it, Bob. If you reject this, we both get nothing.
